biotools.summary:
Performs intersectional genetics-related operations to find VEnCodes using databases provided by the FANTOM5 consortium, namely the CAGE enhancer and transcription start site (TSS) databases.

For more information on the VEnCode technology, please refer to Macedo and Gontijo, bioRxiv 2019

bioschemas.name: VEnCode
